l:item.ofx:paragraph: The "beans modul" is responsible for the data processing. Furthermore, the modul provides the project logic.
The "doc modul" is necessary for the software documentation. Every manual for the web application is included here.
The "ear modul" combines all other modules to a so-called "Enterprise Application Archive". This "ear-file" is executable on the host system.
The "entities modul" maps the project data model to the database structure.
The "interfaces modul" provides all necessary connections between the used technologies.
The "util modul" provides factories and tools.
The "web modul" is the graphical user interface (GUI) for the web application.
The "xml modul" implements a data model for communication between services.
